original_text: Bring the tribe of Levi near, and present them before Aaron the priest, that they may minister unto him.
korean_text: 레위 지파는 나아가 제사장 아론 앞에 서서 그에게 시종하게 하라

sentences.original_text: Bring the tribe of Levi near
and present them before Aaron the priest
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 제사장 아론 앞에 세우라

sentences.original_text: that they may minister unto him
